page.title: 02Highworth's Ghosts.
page.content: {Highworth}has many ghosts, the following have been seen by various people of{Highworth. {The King & Queen Inn.} The ghost of the{King and Queen}is a{13th. {century monk,}which haunts the{600 {year old pub,}once a{coaching inn}and before that a{court_house.}The landlord was alone, he heard his two {Alsatian guard_dogs}start howling. "Quite unlike their normal bark. When I went out they were quite rigid, obviously scared." The ghost was a {three dimensional disfigured {hunch_backed monk. {The Ghost of St. Michaels.}It is a shuffling figure that comes up {Vicarage Lane. It is a monk,}his head bowed and hands together in prayer. Presumably it is also the ghost that haunts the{King and Queen.
